name: Heat Death (Shlomito)
description:
You're a researcher at the White Dwarf Research Station in Planet A of the Planetary System Xf4BA-2. But as the star runs out of all of its energy, you must evacuate, as the Heat Death of the universe starts to show its face.

(Note: I'm not an astrophysisict, and 10 minutes of Wikipedia can only do so much for accuracy. Also, please let me know if you played it all the way to the end)

Controls:
  • Move: A/D - Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Pause: Esc - P
  • Speed up / show next dialogue: Enter
  • Respawn: R

Submission for the OST Jam Vol. 2 - Theme: "Entropy".

Music Used:
  • Nothing Matters - by MelonadeM
  • Subtle Hints of Chaos  - by MistRiven
  • From Stillness Comes Chaos - by Philip Aldous
